synopsis.text: The Files of Kindaichi Returns follows Hajime Kindaichi, a seemingly ordinary high school student who actually possesses remarkable deductive skills inherited from his grandfather, the famous detective Kosuke Kindaichi. When difficult mysteries and crimes arise, Hajime transforms into a skilled detective. Together with his childhood friend and love interest Miyuki Nanase, police inspector Isamu Kenmochi, and friendly rival Kengo Akechi, Hajime puts his sharp intellect to use cracking each convoluted case. In one case, Hajime and Miyuki travel to Hong Kong for a fashion event when Miyuki is kidnapped due to mistaken identity. While attempting to rescue her, Hajime uncovers an entirely different crime that needs solving. With his strong sense of justice and stellar IQ of 180, Hajime unravels the truth behind each mystery he encounters. Combining intrigue, action, friendship, romance, and deductive reasoning, The Files of Kindaichi Returns offers compelling cases for avid mystery fans to solve along with the talented Hajime Kindaichi.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
